text: Frank J. Schlueter (1874 - 1972) was a documentary and commercial photographer in Southeast Texas. ==Career== Schlueter photographed the quickly growing Houston region in the first half of the twentieth century, retiring in 1964. Schlueter's work was used by early oil producers in the region to document and promote their work. ==References== ==External links== * Images by Frank J. Schlueter at the Rice Digital Scholarship Archives "Museum of Houston" * Images by Frank J. Schlueter at the Library of Congress Category:1874 births Category:1972 deaths Category:American photographers Category:Commercial photographers Category:Documentary photographers
title: Frank J. Schlueter
